resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3130</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessun 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - κανένα 30:Inferring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún 30:Inferring</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading comprehension activity where the student is required to read short paragraphs and answer questions on them by drawing inferences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inferences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Leseerfassenaktivität, in der der
Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, kurze Paragraphen und Antwortfragen auf
ihnen zu lesen durch zeichnende Folgerungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité de compréhension de lecture 
où l'étudiant est requis de lire des paragraphes et des questions 
courts de réponse sur elles par des inférences de dessin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade da compreensão da leitura 
onde o estudante seja requerido ler parágrafos e perguntas curtos da 
resposta neles por inferences desenhando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività di comprensione della lettura
dove l'allievo è tenuto a leggere i paragrafi e le domande corti di 
risposta su loro dalle illazioni dissipanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα κατανόησης ανάγνωσης 
όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει για να διαβάσει τις σύντομες 
παραγράφους και τις ερωτήσεις απάντησης σε τους με το σχεδιασμό 
των συμπερασμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad de la comprensión de la 
lectura donde inferencias que trazan requiere al estudiante leer 
párrafos y preguntas cortos de la respuesta en ellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Folgerungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inférences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inferences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συμπεράσματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inferencias</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
